Package pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.transform

Class ShortcutMod

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TextTransformer
pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TextTransformerDecorator
pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.transform.ShortcutMod
public class ShortcutMod extends TextTransformerDecorator
The ShortcutMod class is a decorator for TextTransformer that can expand or compress specified shortcuts in the input text.

  • Nested Class Summary
